general_info.summary: This document lists various campuses and institutes under the Amity University umbrella, including locations in Greater Noida, Lucknow, Jaipur, Gurgaon, Gwalior, Mumbai, Raipur, Kolkata, Ranchi, Patna, Dubai, and London. It also mentions Amity University Online, Amity University Press, Amity Institute for Competitive Leadership, and Amity Indian Military College, along with specific sectors in Gurgaon and Vasundhara. Additionally, it details approved and recognized courses in Computer Science/IT, Psychology & Behavioural Science, Data Sciences & Business Analytics, Political Science, and Sociology, and notes the availability of Ph.D. Scholars Data. The source of the information is identified as a course list from amity.edu.
